content:
{{knowledge objective
|Identifiant=OIC-230-01-A
|Item_parent=Acute chest pain
|Item_parent_short=Acute chest pain
|Rank=A
|Title=Know the definition of acute chest pain
|Description=None
|Rubric=Definition
|Contributors=Vincent Roule
|Order=1}}
'''Know the definition of acute chest pain'''

<nowiki/>= pain (or discomfort) in the region of the rib cage (between the neck and the umbilicus) occurring suddenly.

Variable characteristics: intensity, location, irradiation, duration, triggering or relieving factor, frequency.

question.title: What is the definition of acute chest pain?
question.description: Choose the correct definition of acute chest pain.

option_a.title: Pain or discomfort in the region of the rib cage occurring suddenly and radiating to the back.

option_b.title: Pain or discomfort in the region of the rib cage occurring suddenly and lasting for more than 30 minutes.

option_c.title: Pain or discomfort in the region of the rib cage occurring suddenly and triggered by physical activity.

option_d.title: Pain or discomfort in the region of the rib cage occurring suddenly and relieved by rest.

correct_option.title: A
correct_option.description: The correct letter of the answer option
